root.name: Star Trek: Voyager - Elite Force Expansion Pack
root.description: OverviewThis expansion let you explore all of the major areas of the USS Voyager, as well as interact with various consoles around the ship. You could read personal logs, codex entries, and even fire the torpedoes from the Bridge.In addition, the expansion also a class-based multiplayer mode called 'Specialties'.

similar_games.game: Star Wars: Jedi Knight II - Jedi Outcast
